name: notself
text: I want the mini-poster.

name: maggieobrien
text: Well, do you have a laser printer?

name: notself
text: I'd rather give my money to Vlad

name: cailetshadow
text: There's a bumper sticker waiting to happen.

name: gsail11
text: Well, do you have a laser printer?

name: arelladawn
text:
"That's not even a product"

Awesome.

name: alilsneaky
text: the eagerness implied by 'chicks are tearink off their panties with both hands' part made me laugh so hard.

name: notself
text: A comment left by notself was marked as spam and excluded. notself: What a douche. (reported by mistlethrush, Magb, Saint)

name: notself
text: A comment left by notself was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kenthegod, ghoti, Saint)

name: catachresis
text: The yarmulke reflects Vlad's aversion to linguistic contractions

name: connellingus
text: But not the shirt, mysteriously.

name: nurdbot
text:
Teodor doesn't believe woman act that way. EVER.

Also the bonus item, a paperclip, wouldn't work very well in practice as a hairclip.

name: fidget
text: i don't think it's a paperclip, i'm pretty sure it really is a hairclip

name: epicurus
text: The funniest part, IMO, is how in panel five, Teodor says he doesn't think that shirt is the solution - i.e. women not acting that way is a problem as well as a reality.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Dusty, sarmatron, Thorfinn, lordofring, wittyname, thesyndicate88, NDCaesar, howl, cailetshadow, scraggg, QuantumCasaba, jwinehou)

name: epicurus
text: Curse you, overmedicated! You've foiled my plot to sprinkle extremely oblique anti-semitic propaganda into the Achewood message boards! Aaaaarggh!

name: i_love_kate
text: I can totally picture Epicurus toppling backwards into his own acid pit as he yells this.

name: c_dizzle
text: ...only to find the charred remains of Anne Coulter, let's hope.

name: epicurus
text: If a hideous death in an acid pit would be all that was necessary to never have to be subjected to Ann Coulter again, then sign me the hell UP.

name: semiquaver
text: Well, committing suicide would technically get you out of ever having to listen to her yammering again.

name: dusty
text: Unless you believe in hell, where she would most certainly be waiting to torment your soul for eternity.

name: semiquaver
text: I assume Ann Coulter has her own special hell.

name: boredom_man
text:
Indeed, set up especially to torment her, populated entirely by witty, politically-aware American gays...

...Oh dear. You may have a Problem.

name: dusty
text: yeah, but if its not his hell, and it is hers, shed be something appropriate for her personality like a little yappy dog.

name: semiquaver
text: Uhm.  Thank you for the compliments, but I really have to go sit in a corner and shudder for a while.  The thought of getting a loophole out of getting a loophole out of spending eternity with Ann Coulter fills me with a very special Roast Beef-like sense of futility and despair.

name: gouldgonewild
text: At least you admitted it. It's final now.

name: dusty
text: On a side note, I rather liked this comment about women not ripping off their panties being something to which which there would be a solution , and your completely nonsensical implication that the word solution is antisemitic has completely derailed that line of discussion. That's like saying that you can't say "manifest" around Native Americans, or "Property" around black people.

name: saru
text: I too believe that this is a problem. My brothers and I are attending a rally this weekend to that effect. Perhaps you'd like to attend?

name: littlefatdog
text: Vlad uses his robot intelligence to engineer the most topic-touchy funny joke but of course his cold steel heart can't grasp the humanity of humor

name: finemusk
text: besides, he wants 5 bucks for a punchline

name: aperson
text:
"...and?
Five dollars."

Five points more like! (Strip rating points. For this strip)

name: thatskotkid
text: A comment left by thatskotkid was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by GSurge, howl, aHatOfPig)

name: erdrick
text: Is that the joke's punch-line or is Vlad being "Jewish"? If he's being ironic on purpose I love how he tries to chat up his customer with a (free) joke in order to keep him in a positive mood to buy more crap. Except the joke is actually racist and offensive and even more ironic. 5 Stars.

name: joeyramoney
text: there was a kid at my high school who was a gay black jew. swear to god. he also talked to himself.

name: cailetshadow
text: army of one

name: shutup_shutup
text: I know a gay black jew as well.  I've met him a number of times and had to be reintroduced to him almost every one of those times.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Ha! Typical.

name: tekende
text: Was it because they "all look alike"?

name: sooprmunky61
text: I once knew a gay black mormon republican.  I believe he was a special interest group, or his own tax bracket, etc.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: "I AM WITH MY STUPID BUTT"

name: honesttom
text: This has to be one of my favourites. So many jokes, in so few panels. Good jokes, too.

name: tekende
text: And they didn't cost five dollars.

name: heyoo
text: I am a huge fan of the Jewishness world tour. It is completely epic Rock 'n' Roll 'n' Torah.

name: boredom_man
text: It sounds good when you first hear about it, but it's actually just one of the Wainwrights singing the unpublished verses of "Hallelujah" over and over again.

name: clever-nickname
text: A comment left by clever-nickname was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, Overmedicated, waldo913, jocelynthepink)

name: relaxing
text: That is a very bad joke.  And the clip goes in the back, so the butt.

name: jackparsons
text: You third chakra is stupid.

name: boredom_man
text: ...and inarticulate.

name: c_dizzle
text: Could be the side, too...stupid ear!

name: stuart
text: I'm ashamed of myself for chubbying that.

name: hypoluxa
text:
In reference to the alt text....

I don't get why Foxworthy is included. What am I stupidly missing????

name: unfun
text: Mother-in-laws.

name: em2
text: I'm with stupid scalp.

name: achilleselbow
text: This is pretty much the answer I give when people ask me if I'm Jewish, and it's hella awkward. Like people are gonna think I'm ashamed of it or something. I know a lot of people in a similar situation, and it always surprises me how clueless both Jews and non-Jews are about the whole religion/ethnicity conundrum (the former about the answer, the latter about the fact that it even exists).

name: boredom_man
text: I'm not sure I follow you. It's a conundrum. It doesn't have an answer.

name: howl
text: Vlad has a Star of David bag to go with the Jesus Fish one from his previous business enterprise.

name: comrade_tom
text:
That being plastered over the orthodox cross from a couple of years.

"St Theodora poster- is perhaps sexiest mosaic you are ever seeing!"

name: howl
text:
Indeed.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Tuesday Blogs

Ray: NOTHIN'!

name: charchar
text: Vlad holds the shirt up, thus demonstrating to T just how very fly the shirt would be on a being. However, even Vlad acknowledges that the shirt works best in a saloon.

name: heccibiggs
text: Both hands? Is that sexier than tearing off your panties with one hand?

name: griffypoo
text: No, but it's faster. And when you're looking to get kissed for being kosher in a saloon, that's the most important part .

name: phthoggos
text: Vlad's use of the existential verb "is" (where standard English uses "there is," "there are," or "we have") recalls [url=http://achewood.com/index.php?date=03282006]Uncle George's signage[/url ("is gyros," "is lotto," etc).

name: phthoggos
text: Vlad's use of the existential verb "is" (where standard English uses "there is," "there are," or "we have") recalls Uncle George's signage ("is gyros," "is lotto," etc).

text: heh kramer
